name: Elastigale: For Her Sake
description:
This comic is set immediately after the events of "Lost and Found." 

Helen and Bob have a long and intimate history with Gail (aka Stratogale), who was presumed dead almost 20 years ago. Now she has mysteriously reappeared, with no legs and more importantly, no memories! How will the family handle this difficult situation? 

Best enjoyed after reading the previous stories in the Elastigale AU. <3
